tool_description: This API allows users to send an X.509 certificate in base64-encoded DER format, and receive information about the certificate. The API returns the expiration date, issuer information, key algorithm, serial number, and subject information for the provided certificate.
name: Electronic Certificate Verification
title: Electronic Certificate Verification

api_list.name: CertInfo
api_list.description: Get information about your certificate. Certificate has to in the base64 encoded string format. For details, see Readme and Documentation.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://electronic-certificate-verification.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "electronic-certificate-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://electronic-certificate-verification.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "electronic-certificate-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
